name: Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death
name_original: Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death
description:
Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death is an adventure-platformer game developed by CollectorVision and CollectorVision Games. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by CollectorVision Games.
You can play Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death on SEGA Master System, NES and SNES.
